langChoice: Choose the language you want to use in Zurichat.
tzDesc: Zurichat uses your time zone to send summary and notification emails, for times in your activity feeds and for reminders.

diffSettings: Use different settings for my mobile device
notifyOnMeeting: Notify me when a meeting is set
notifyOnReply: Notify me of replies to thread
notifyAny: You will be notified anything, someone uses these keywords in a thread
notifySchedule: You'll only receive notifications in the hours that you choose, Outside of those times, notifications will be paused.
notActiveDesktop: When I am not active on desktop
sendMail: Send me email notifications for mentions
chooseSound: Choose which sounds and announcements you'd like to receive while using a

playSound: Play a sound when a message is received

improveZuri: You can improve the way you use Zurichat by learning our
pressEmpty: Press in the empty message field to:
moveFocus: Move focus to the message list
lastVisible: The last visible message in the list will be selected
lastVisibleMsg: The last visible message you sent will be selected and in the editing mode
editWithOpt: to edit your last message, with either option.
typingCode: When typing code with , should send the message
txtFormat: The text formatting toolbar won't show in the composer
overide: Overrides normal behaviour in search behaviour
overrideSome: Overrides normal behaviour in some browsers
exclude: Exclude these channels from the search results:
ask: Ask if I want to toggle my away status when I log in after having set myself away
occasional: Send me occasional survey via Zurichat bot We're working to make Zurichat better. We'd always love to hear your thoughts
aboutM: Warn me about potential malicious links
